forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Then remaining cloudy. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the morning. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain late. Increasing winds. Low 7C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then becoming windy with a steady rain overnight. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 11C. SE winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 52F. SE winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 51F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
